disclaimer.welcome: Welcome to {productName}! Please review the following important information before continuing.

disclaimer.analytics.title: Workspace Activity Analytics
disclaimer.analytics.description: User activities within workspaces may be used for analytics and insight generation to improve team collaboration and productivity.
disclaimer.p2p.title: Message Privacy and Legal Access
disclaimer.p2p.description: All messages are stored using peer-to-peer encryption. However, in exceptional circumstances involving legal requirements and institutional disciplinary actions, we reserve all rights to access stored data, including images.
disclaimer.credentials.title: Local Credential Storage
disclaimer.credentials.description: All user credentials and API keys are stored locally on your device only and are never transmitted to our servers.
disclaimer.agreement: By clicking 'Accept', you agree to these terms and conditions.
disclaimer.declined: Terms declined. You have been logged out.

encryption.dialog.description: This message is protected by end-to-end encryption. Only you and the intended recipients can read it.
encryption.dialog.descriptionUnencrypted: This message is not encrypted and can be read by anyone with access to the server.
